titles.title: A resolution commending the University of Southern California Trojans football team for winning the 2004 Bowl Championship Series national championship game.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 1/25/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Commends the University of Southern California Trojans football team for winning the 2004 Bowl Championship Series national championship game.
